ModMetaData.name: Choose Pawn Settings
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iCj5o7O.png[/img]
Lets you change stuff for pawnkinds. Started as a replacemet for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2020630826]Configurable Biocoding[/url] but started adding more properties to modify.
Currently implemented [list] [*] Biocode Chance [*] Chemical Addiction Chance [*] Combat Enhancing Drugs Chance [*] Headgear Chance [*] Combat Power [*] Tech Hediffs Chance [*] Tech Hediffs Money [*] Tech Hediffs Tags [*] Weapon Money [*] Weapon Tags [*] Apparel Money [*] Apparel Tags [*] Generation Age [*] Gender Probability [*] Death Acidifier [*] Royal Title Chance (Royalty required) [/list]
Changes are instant but will only affect pawns when they spawn.
If you have suggestions on more properties to change, leave a comment and Ill look into adding it.
